section.p: You get to hear about a spice shipment from Ankon-Konu that is due to arrive in port within a few days. ‘I got the news from a wizard who’s just come from Dweomer,’ says the merchant who is telling you this.
‘How come his ship got here before the one with the spice?’ He gives you a knowing smirk. ‘I said he’s a wizard. He probably flew here on a demon’s back!’
